Module: adminïƒ

This module is used to query data about privileged accounts.

General usage:

ğŸ¦ > admin <submodule>[=enabled]

Results can be exported to a csv file using the keyword â€œexportâ€ at the end of the command:

ğŸ¦ > admin <submodule> export

A csv file will be generated in â€œexportsâ€ directory.

admin domainïƒ

This submodule finds all members of â€œdomain adminsâ€ group.

ğŸ¦ > admin domain

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > admin domain=enabled

This submodule finds all members of â€œenterprise adminsâ€ group.

ğŸ¦ > admin enterprise=enabled
